tool_description:
Easy to implement API that delivers quality data on the doctor and medical professionals including name, address, specialty, etc.

with this, you will get the details of almost 12k doctors and medical professionals in Jaipur, India
name: Indian Doctors and Jaipur Medical Professionals
title: Indian Doctors and Jaipur Medical Professionals
tool_name: Indian Doctors and Jaipur Medical Professionals

api_list.name: doctor by area
api_list.description: Get the list of doctors using location

api_list.name: home
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indian-doctors-and-jaipur-medical-professionals.p.rapidapi.com/doctors/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indian-doctors-and-jaipur-medical-professionals.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://indian-doctors-and-jaipur-medical-professionals.p.rapidapi.com/doctors/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indian-doctors-and-jaipur-medical-professionals.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
